description:
Commanding panoramic views from an elevated 900sqm allotment, this Californian Bungalow inspired home has been thoughtfully crafted to offer an incredible lifestyle. Complete with a private lift, a luxurious swimming pool, marvellous entertainment options and a mesmerising outlook, this dual-level property is a true modern masterpiece.

Intelligently designed to highlight the phenomenal vista, the residence celebrates contemporary refinement with attractive tiled floors, a calming neutral colour palette and banks of full-height glass. Louvered windows and lofty ceilings create a bright and airy atmosphere, while a striking modern façade and landscaped gardens give the home spectacular street appeal.

A well-considered layout promises to impress, ensuring seamless living and excellent accessibility. Featuring a wheelchair-friendly ramp at the property's front and a private lift, the residence boasts a wonderfully spacious open-plan living and dining area on the upper level. Spilling out onto a covered balcony boasting a built-in barbecue and breathtaking city views, this sophisticated central space will make you feel right at home.

Illuminated by beautiful pendant lights, a sensational adjoining kitchen displays a breakfast bar, stone accents, Liebherr appliances, a Vintec wine fridge and ample cupboard storage. A linked butler's pantry extends the preparation space, making preparing a delicious meal a stress-free affair.

Downstairs, a generous lounge room encompassing a wet bar leads out to the property's exceptional outdoor entertainment area. Framed by established gardens, a large fully-fenced grassed rear yard provides vast amounts of space for children and pets. Entertainers will also love the covered al fresco area, which flows to a glass-framed in-ground swimming pool.

Also on this level is a sizeable media room, as well as a full bathroom and a fourth bedroom or office with a connecting patio, a built-in robe and its own entrance.

A lavish retreat, the residence's master bedroom is positioned on the upper level and captures stunning views of the iconic city skyline. Benefitting from a private dressing room with vast amounts of wardrobe storage, this luxe bedroom also has an opulent ensuite showcasing dual vanities, floor-to-ceiling tiling and a separate bath and shower.

Another two ensuited bedrooms fitted with built-in robes are accompanied by a tidy powder room, finishing this level.

Boasting an internal laundry and an abundance of storage, the home also features a secure three-car garage. Other notable details include a Vacumaid system, a back-to-base security alarm, ducted air-conditioning and ceiling fans.
Streets away from the popular Jam Pantry café and Logan Road's many shops and dining options, this unrivalled property is only six kilometres from Brisbane's CBD. Coorparoo Square, Stone's Corner's attractions, Thompson Estate Reserve's playgrounds and the South East Freeway Bikeway are nearby. Medical-workers will also value the residence's proximity to Greenslopes Private Hospital, Princess Alexandra, Mater and Queensland Children's hospitals.

Enjoying easy access to some of Brisbane's best private schools, this incomparable residence is also a short drive from Saint James Catholic Primary School, Saint Elizabeth's Primary School and Our Lady of Mount Carmel Primary School. Anglican Church Grammar School, Somerville House and Saint Laurence's College are minutes away. Do not miss this exclusive opportunity – call to arrange an inspection today.

Disclaimer:
We have in preparing this advertisement used our best endeavours to ensure the information contained is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements contained. Prospective purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this advertisement.
